# Stock Verify – VS Code Workspace Rules

## Stack
- FastAPI (async only)
- React Native 0.81 + Expo 54
- MongoDB 8 (primary)
- SQL Server (ERP – READ ONLY)
- Redis (locking)

## AI Usage Rules
- GitHub Copilot = code typing only
- Do NOT ask Copilot to redesign architecture
- ERP write-back is permanently forbidden
- Always reference SRS before coding
